meanings.sent1: The infecund soil yielded no crops this season.
meanings.sent2: The infecund land could not support any plant life.
meanings.sent3: The infecund garden seemed to be on a permanent vacation from growth.
meanings.sent4: Her infecund ideas failed to spark any creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The infecund desert stretched out endlessly, devoid of any signs of life.

meanings.sent1: The infecund couple longed for a child of their own.
meanings.sent2: The infecund animals at the zoo were carefully monitored for breeding.
meanings.sent3: The infecund birds in the nest tried to adopt a baby squirrel.
meanings.sent4: The infecund tree could not bear any fruit despite the perfect conditions.
meanings.sent5: The infecund queen bee struggled to expand her hive with no new bees.

meanings.sent1: The infecund land was a stark contrast to the lush fields nearby.
meanings.sent2: The infecund tree stood alone in the orchard, devoid of blossoms.
meanings.sent3: The infecund well seemed to have run out of water for good.
meanings.sent4: Her infecund efforts to start a business left her feeling defeated.
meanings.sent5: The infecund winter landscape was silent, with no signs of life stirring.
